text: Mahon is an unincorporated community in Marshall County, Mississippi, United States. ==History== A post office called Mahon was established in 1890, and remained in operation until 1919. The community was named for John Mahon. The population in 1900 was 41. ==References== Category:Unincorporated communities in Marshall County, Mississippi Category:Unincorporated communities in Mississippi
title: Mahon, Mississippi
